title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries for downloading and running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node, Deno, and browsers; streaming chat completions and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, multi-user support, and RAG over documents.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing synchronous and asynchronous wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama from Rails or plain Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Enhanced Go CLI that wraps ollama with prompt templates, conversation history, and shell integration.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that streams responses from a local Ollama instance via its OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and model pre-loading.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama and common models to NixOS, enabling reproducible local LLM setups.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models from C# with streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama models via OpenAI-compatible REST endpoints plus a web chat interface.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that sends selected notes to a local Ollama model for summarization or Q&A inside the editor.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model via Bolt for JavaScript.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bringing Ollama models into servers with slash commands, conversation memory, and admin controls.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping the Ollama REST API for use in Phoenix applications with GenServer-based clients.
